CustomField.formula: IF ( (Existing_Account__r.Customer_Type_f__c = 'Existing' || ISPICKVAL(Existing_Account__r.Account_Type__c, 'Domestic Strategic Account') || ISPICKVAL(Existing_Account__r.Account_Type__c, 'Global Strategic Account') || DoNotCall = TRUE || HasOptedOutOfEmail = TRUE || Existing_Account__r.Count_of_Active_Opps__c > 0 || Existing_Account__r.Competitor__c = TRUE || Existing_Account__r.Supplier__c = TRUE || Existing_Account__r.Partner__c = TRUE ) ,true, false )
CustomField.label: Open Doors DNC
